ygData.subject: Re: Is there anyone out there still on this list?  No bugs  here.
ygData.msgSnippet: No gating or binding for us holy warriors - walk or run everywhere!  Thank goodness for bards and their running song, or Shamen, Druids, and Rangers for the
ygData.messageBody:
No gating or binding for us holy warriors - walk or run everywhere! Thank
goodness for bards and their running song, or Shamen, Druids, and Rangers for
the Spirit of the Wolf spell!

By the way, I have two questions for the group:
1. I'm very close to 10th level - what is the next skill gained after 9th?
2. I'm currently using a Minotaur axe - what have you found to be the next
logical weapon upgrade?

Best to you all,
Kaladin the Paladin from Kaladim (who is *still* mad at the random name
generator, grrr..)

"Daniel C. Daugherty" wrote:

> Its quiet here....
>
> I have a high level Magician and just recently started a Paladin. I have to
> say... I really like him.. but hate not being able to gate. Do you all
> just walk the land? Selling and buying from Innkeepers? Just going back to
